						light_infantry_brigade_activation = 4
						light_infantry_brigade_activation_hidden = 3
						NOT = { light_infantry_brigade_activation_hidden = 4 }
					}
					AND = {
						light_infantry_brigade_activation = 5
						light_infantry_brigade_activation_hidden = 4
						NOT = { light_infantry_brigade_activation_hidden = 5 }
					}
					AND = {
						light_infantry_brigade_activation = 6
						light_infantry_brigade_activation_hidden = 5
						NOT = { light_infantry_brigade_activation_hidden = 6 }
					}
					AND = {
						light_infantry_brigade_activation = 7
						light_infantry_brigade_activation_hidden = 6
						NOT = { light_infantry_brigade_activation_hidden = 7 }
					}
					AND = {
						light_infantry_brigade_activation = 8
						light_infantry_brigade_activation_hidden = 7
						NOT = { light_infantry_brigade_activation_hidden = 8 }
					}
					AND = {
						light_infantry_brigade_activation = 9
						light_infantry_brigade_activation_hidden = 8
						NOT = { light_infantry_brigade_activation_hidden = 9 }
					}
					AND = {
						light_infantry_brigade_activation = 10
						light_infantry_brigade_activation_hidden = 9
						NOT = { light_infantry_brigade_activation_hidden = 10 }
					}
					AND = {
						light_infantry_brigade_activation = 11
						light_infantry_brigade_activation_hidden = 10
						NOT = { light_infantry_brigade_activation_hidden = 11 }
					}
					AND = {
						light_infantry_brigade_activation = 12
						light_infantry_brigade_activation_hidden = 11
						NOT = { light_infantry_brigade_activation_hidden = 12 }
					}
				}
			}
			light_infantry_brigade_activation_hidden = 6000
		}

		# Vehicle_reliability
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					AND = {

						Vehicle_reliability_hidden = 0
						NOT = { Vehicle_reliability_hidden = 1 }
					}
					AND = {

					}

				}
			}
			mountain_warfare_equipment_hidden = 6000
		}

		# artic_warfare_equipment
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					AND = {
						artic_warfare_equipment = 1
						artic_warfare_equipment_hidden = 0
						NOT = { artic_warfare_equipment_hidden = 1 }
					}
				}
			}
			artic_warfare_equipment_hidden = 6000

		# fire_control_computer
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					AND = {
						fire_control_computer = 1
						fire_control_computer_hidden = 0
						NOT = { fire_control_computer_hidden = 1 }
					}
					AND = {
						fire_control_computer = 2
						fire_control_computer_hidden = 1
						NOT = { fire_control_computer_hidden = 2 }
					}
					AND = {
						fire_control_computer = 3
						fire_control_computer_hidden = 2
						NOT = { fire_control_computer_hidden = 3 }
					}
					AND = {
						fire_control_computer = 4
						fire_control_computer_hidden = 3
						NOT = { fire_control_computer_hidden = 4 }
					}
					AND = {
						fire_control_computer = 5
						fire_control_computer_hidden = 4
						NOT = { fire_control_computer_hidden = 5 }
					}
					AND = {
						fire_control_computer = 6
						fire_control_computer_hidden = 5
						NOT = { fire_control_computer_hidden = 6 }
					}
				}
			}
			fire_control_computer_hidden = 6000
		}

		# AAA_control_computer
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					AND = {
						AAA_control_computer = 1
						AAA_control_computer_hidden = 0
						NOT = { AAA_control_computer_hidden = 1 }
					}
					AND = {
						AAA_control_computer = 2
						AAA_control_computer_hidden = 1

						carrier_engine_hidden = 7

						submarine_battery = 4
						submarine_battery_hidden = 3
						NOT = { submarine_battery_hidden = 4 }
					}
					AND = {
						submarine_battery = 5
						submarine_battery_hidden = 4
						NOT = { submarine_battery_hidden = 5 }
					}
					AND = {
						submarine_battery = 6
						submarine_battery_hidden = 5
						NOT = { submarine_battery_hidden = 6 }
					}
					AND = {
						submarine_battery = 7
						submarine_battery_hidden = 6
						NOT = { submarine_battery_hidden = 7 }
					}
					AND = {
						submarine_battery = 8
						submarine_battery_hidden = 7
						NOT = { submarine_battery_hidden = 8 }
					}
				}
			}
			submarine_battery_hidden = 6000
		}

		# submarine_antiaircraft
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					AND = {
						submarine_antiaircraft = 1
						submarine_antiaircraft_hidden = 0
						NOT = { submarine_antiaircraft_hidden = 1 }
					}
					AND = {
						submarine_antiaircraft = 2
						submarine_antiaircraft_hidden = 1
						NOT = { submarine_antiaircraft_hidden = 2 }
					}
					AND = {
						submarine_antiaircraft = 3
						submarine_antiaircraft_hidden = 2
						NOT = { submarine_antiaircraft_hidden = 3 }
					}
					AND = {
						submarine_antiaircraft = 4
						submarine_antiaircraft_hidden = 3
						NOT = { submarine_antiaircraft_hidden = 4 }
					}
					AND = {
						submarine_antiaircraft = 5
						submarine_antiaircraft_hidden = 4
						NOT = { submarine_antiaircraft_hidden = 5 }
					}
					AND = {
						submarine_antiaircraft = 6
						submarine_antiaircraft_hidden = 5
						NOT = { submarine_antiaircraft_hidden = 6 }
					}
					AND = {
						submarine_antiaircraft = 7
						submarine_antiaircraft_hidden = 6
						NOT = { submarine_antiaircraft_hidden = 7 }
					}
					AND = {
						submarine_antiaircraft = 8
						submarine_antiaircraft_hidden = 7
						NOT = { submarine_antiaircraft_hidden = 8 }
					}
					AND = {
						submarine_antiaircraft = 9
						submarine_antiaircraft_hidden = 8
						NOT = { submarine_antiaircraft_hidden = 9 }
					}
					AND = {
						submarine_antiaircraft = 10
						submarine_antiaircraft_hidden = 9
						NOT = { submarine_antiaircraft_hidden = 10 }
					}
					AND = {
						submarine_antiaircraft = 11
						submarine_antiaircraft_hidden = 10
						NOT = { submarine_antiaircraft_hidden = 11 }
					}
					AND = {
						submarine_antiaircraft = 12
						submarine_antiaircraft_hidden = 11
						NOT = { submarine_antiaircraft_hidden = 12 }
					}
				}
			}
			submarine_antiaircraft_hidden = 6000

					}
					AND = {
						cag_torpedo = 9
						cag_torpedo_hidden = 8
						NOT = { cag_torpedo_hidden = 9 }
					}
					AND = {
						cag_torpedo = 10
						cag_torpedo_hidden = 9
						NOT = { cag_torpedo_hidden = 10 }
					}
					AND = {
						cag_torpedo = 11
						cag_torpedo_hidden = 10
						NOT = { cag_torpedo_hidden = 11 }
					}
					AND = {
						cag_torpedo = 12
						cag_torpedo_hidden = 11
						NOT = { cag_torpedo_hidden = 12 }
					}
				}
			}
			cag_torpedo_hidden = 6000
		}
		# cag_fighter
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					AND = {
						cag_fighter = 1

						rivetted_armour_hidden = 3
						NOT = { rivetted_armour_hidden = 4 }
					}
					AND = {
						rivetted_armour = 5
						rivetted_armour_hidden = 4
						NOT = { rivetted_armour_hidden = 5 }
					}
					AND = {
						rivetted_armour = 6
						rivetted_armour_hidden = 5
						NOT = { rivetted_armour_hidden = 6 }
					}
				}
			}
			rivetted_armour_hidden = 6000
		}

		# welded_armour
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					AND = {
						welded_armour = 1
						welded_armour_hidden = 0
						NOT = { welded_armour_hidden = 1 }
					}
					AND = {
						welded_armour = 2
						welded_armour_hidden = 1
						NOT = { welded_armour_hidden = 2 }
					}
					AND = {
						welded_armour = 3
						welded_armour_hidden = 2
						NOT = { welded_armour_hidden = 3 }
					}
					AND = {
						welded_armour = 4
						welded_armour_hidden = 3
						NOT = { welded_armour_hidden = 4 }
					}
					AND = {
						welded_armour = 5
						welded_armour_hidden = 4
						NOT = { welded_armour_hidden = 5 }
					}
				}
			}
			welded_armour_hidden = 6000
		}

						NOT = { armor_plate_design_hidden = 3 }
					}

						NOT = { armor_plate_design_hidden = 4 }
					}
					AND = {
						armor_plate_design = 5

						NOT = { armor_plate_design_hidden = 5 }
					}

						armor_plate_design = 6
						armor_plate_design_hidden = 5
						NOT = { armor_plate_design_hidden = 6 }
					}

						armor_plate_design = 7

						NOT = { armor_plate_design_hidden = 7 }
					}

						armor_plate_design = 8

					}
					AND = {
						armor_plate_design = 9
						armor_plate_design_hidden = 8
						NOT = { armor_plate_design_hidden = 9 }
					}
					AND = {
						armor_plate_design = 10
						armor_plate_design_hidden = 9
						NOT = { armor_plate_design_hidden = 10 }
					}
					AND = {
						armor_plate_design = 11

						NOT = { armor_plate_design_hidden = 11 }
					}

					}

						tank_radios_hidden = 7
						NOT = { tank_radios_hidden = 8 }
					}
					AND = {
						tank_radios = 9
						tank_radios_hidden = 8
						NOT = { tank_radios_hidden = 9 }
					}
					AND = {
						tank_radios = 10
						tank_radios_hidden = 9
						NOT = { tank_radios_hidden = 10 }
					}
				}
			}
			tank_radios_hidden = 6000
		}

		# big_ship_radar
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					AND = {
						big_ship_radar = 1
						big_ship_radar_hidden = 0
						NOT = { big_ship_radar_hidden = 1 }

					AND = {
						big_ship_radar = 2

					}
					AND = {
						military_police = 12
						military_police_hidden = 11
						NOT = { military_police_hidden = 12 }
					}
				}
			}
			military_police_hidden = 6000
		}

		# medical_evacuation
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					AND = {
						medical_evacuation = 1
						medical_evacuation_hidden = 0
						NOT = { medical_evacuation_hidden = 1 }
					}
				}
			}
			medical_evacuation_hidden = 6000

		# airborne_command_and_control
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					AND = {
						airborne_command_and_control = 1

						NOT = { airborne_command_and_control_hidden = 1 }

						NOT = { airborne_command_and_control_hidden = 2 }
					}
					AND = {

						NOT = { airborne_command_and_control_hidden = 3 }
					}

						NOT = { airborne_command_and_control_hidden = 4 }
					}
					AND = {
						airborne_command_and_control = 5
						airborne_command_and_control_hidden = 4
						NOT = { airborne_command_and_control_hidden = 5 }
					}
					AND = {
						airborne_command_and_control = 6
						airborne_command_and_control_hidden = 5
						NOT = { airborne_command_and_control_hidden = 6 }
					}
					AND = {
						airborne_command_and_control = 7
						airborne_command_and_control_hidden = 6
						NOT = { airborne_command_and_control_hidden = 7 }
					}
					AND = {
						airborne_command_and_control = 8
						airborne_command_and_control_hidden = 7
						NOT = { airborne_command_and_control_hidden = 8 }
					}
					AND = {
						airborne_command_and_control = 9
						airborne_command_and_control_hidden = 8
						NOT = { airborne_command_and_control_hidden = 9 }
					}
					AND = {
						airborne_command_and_control = 10
						airborne_command_and_control_hidden = 9
						NOT = { airborne_command_and_control_hidden = 10 }
					}
					AND = {
						airborne_command_and_control = 11
						airborne_command_and_control_hidden = 10
						NOT = { airborne_command_and_control_hidden = 11 }
					}
					AND = {
						airborne_command_and_control = 12
						airborne_command_and_control_hidden = 11
						NOT = { airborne_command_and_control_hidden = 12 }
					}
				}
			}
			airborne_command_and_control_hidden = 6000
		}

		# Auftragstaktik
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					AND = {
						Auftragstaktik = 1
						Auftragstaktik_hidden = 0
						NOT = { Auftragstaktik_hidden = 1 }
					}
					AND = {
						Auftragstaktik = 2
						Auftragstaktik_hidden = 1

					AND = {
						Auftragstaktik = 3
						Auftragstaktik_hidden = 2

						ammo_capacity = 1

						NOT = { ammo_capacity_hidden = 1 }
					}
					AND = {
						ammo_capacity = 2
						ammo_capacity_hidden = 1
						NOT = { ammo_capacity_hidden = 2 }
					}
					AND = {
						ammo_capacity = 3
						ammo_capacity_hidden = 2
						NOT = { ammo_capacity_hidden = 3 }
					}
					AND = {
						ammo_capacity = 4
						ammo_capacity_hidden = 3
						NOT = { ammo_capacity_hidden = 4 }
					}
					AND = {
						ammo_capacity = 5
						ammo_capacity_hidden = 4
						NOT = { ammo_capacity_hidden = 5 }
					}
					AND = {
						ammo_capacity = 6
						ammo_capacity_hidden = 5
						NOT = { ammo_capacity_hidden = 6 }
					}
					AND = {
						ammo_capacity = 7
						ammo_capacity_hidden = 6
						NOT = { ammo_capacity_hidden = 7 }
					}
					AND = {
						ammo_capacity = 8
						ammo_capacity_hidden = 7
						NOT = { ammo_capacity_hidden = 8 }
					}
					AND = {
						ammo_capacity = 9
						ammo_capacity_hidden = 8
						NOT = { ammo_capacity_hidden = 9 }
					}
					AND = {
						ammo_capacity = 10
						ammo_capacity_hidden = 9
						NOT = { ammo_capacity_hidden = 10 }
					}
					AND = {
						ammo_capacity = 11
						ammo_capacity_hidden = 10
						NOT = { ammo_capacity_hidden = 11 }
					}
					AND = {
						ammo_capacity = 12
						ammo_capacity_hidden = 1
						NOT = { ammo_capacity_hidden = 12 }
					}
				}
			}
			ammo_capacity_hidden = 6000
		}

						aam_hidden = 3
						NOT = { aam_hidden = 4 }
					}
					AND = {
						aam = 5
						aam_hidden = 4
						NOT = { aam_hidden = 5 }
					}
					AND = {
						aam = 6
						aam_hidden = 5
						NOT = { aam_hidden = 6 }
					}
					AND = {
						aam = 7
						aam_hidden = 6
						NOT = { aam_hidden = 7 }
					}
					AND = {
						aam = 8
						aam_hidden = 7
						NOT = { aam_hidden = 8 }
					}
					AND = {
						aam = 9
						aam_hidden = 8
						NOT = { aam_hidden = 9 }
					}
					AND = {
						aam = 10
						aam_hidden = 9
						NOT = { aam_hidden = 10 }
					}
					AND = {
						aam = 11
						aam_hidden = 10
						NOT = { aam_hidden = 11 }
					}
					AND = {
						aam = 12
						aam_hidden = 11
						NOT = { aam_hidden = 12 }
					}
				}
			}
			aam_hidden = 6000
		}

						NOT = { capitalship_armament_AP_ammo_hidden = 1 }

					AND = {

						NOT = { capital_ship_horizontal_protection_hidden = 5 }

		add_country_modifier = {
			name = "hidden_tech_check_cooldown"
			duration = 5
		}

		ai_chance = { factor = 100 }

	}	
}
